body:
Will there be any TnT maps in the upcoming Avicus tourney?

(Don't lock)
body_tagged:
Will there be any TnT maps in the upcoming Avicus tourney?

(Don't lock)
title: TnT maps in an Avicus tourney?

replies.body: Yes, tourney will consist of multiple if not all TNT maps.
replies.body_tagged: Yes, tourney will consist of multiple if not all TNT maps.

replies.body: Ehhhhh a mixed tourney with all tnt maps would be kinda bad imo.
replies.body_tagged: Ehhhhh a mixed tourney with all tnt maps would be kinda bad imo.

replies.body: Well its not going to be all tnt maps
replies.body_tagged: Well its not going to be all tnt maps

reply_to.body: Ehhhhh a mixed tourney with all tnt maps would be kinda bad imo.
reply_to.body_tagged: Ehhhhh a mixed tourney with all tnt maps would be kinda bad imo.

replies.body:
IMO there shouldn't be any, atleast not the 1st and 2nd round.
Since the launch of Avicus there have only been 4/3(max 5?) maps that contained TNT.
TNT has never been a big aspect of Avicus. I'd much rather see TE versions of MCzone maps throughout the tourney. Yes, I do know how to make cannons but I can imagine a lot of Avicus players don't. They probaly end up making flat cannons. more coming soon ehh

replies.body: +1 I wasn't looking for tnters when recruiting because tbh its not part of avicus gameplay.
